meanings.definition: A chemical compound used in some medications for its antiseptic properties.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed a medication containing hexylresorcinols to treat the infection.
meanings.sent2: Many antiseptic creams include hexylresorcinols as an active ingredient.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria were no match for the powerful hexylresorcinols in the medicine.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against germs, hexylresorcinols acted like a brave knight protecting the body.
meanings.sent5: The smell of hexylresorcinols in the ointment reminded her of cleanliness and healing.

meanings.definition: Hexylresorcinols are commonly found in certain skincare products for their antibacterial effects.
meanings.sent1: She chose the face wash with hexylresorcinols to keep her skin clear.
meanings.sent2: The antibacterial properties of hexylresorcinols help in fighting acne.
meanings.sent3: The hexylresorcinols in the lotion were like tiny soldiers battling the bacteria on her face.
meanings.sent4: Her skincare routine felt complete with the protective shield of hexylresorcinols.
meanings.sent5: The effectiveness of hexylresorcinols in skincare amazed her with each use.
